mapper.insert: insert into vocabulary (id, danci, hanyi, type, ext1, status, renshi, changdu) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{danci,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hanyi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{renshi,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{changdu,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update vocabulary set danci = #{danci,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hanyi = #{hanyi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, renshi = #{renshi,jdbcType=INTEGER}, changdu = #{changdu,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, danci, hanyi, type, ext1, status, renshi, changdu from vocabulary
select id, danci, hanyi, type, ext1, status, renshi, changdu from vocabulary order by changdu asc
